title: The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate (Pilot)
plot: Rachel runs from her wedding and meets the friends in the coffee place. Ross is depressed about his divorce but he still has a crush on Rachel.

title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
plot: Ross's lesbian ex-wife is pregnant with his child, and he doesn't like her choice of a last name for the baby.

title: The One with the Thumb
plot: A soda company gives Phoebe $7,000 after she finds a dismembered thumb in a can of soda.

title: The One with George Stephanopoulos
plot: A deliveryman accidentally brings a pizza meant for George Stephanopoulos, who lives across the street from the girls.

title: The One with the East German Laundry Detergent
plot: Ross helps Rachel do laundry and considers the evening a first date. Joey has Monica pose as his new girlfriend.

title: The One with the Butt
plot: Joey gets his big film break when he's hired to be Al Pacino's stunt butt.

title: The One with the Blackout
plot: During a citywide blackout, Ross tries to tell Rachel that he likes her.

title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
plot: Monica and Ross mourn the death of their grandmother. Chandler questions his sexuality.

title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
plot: Monica's first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang burns when they all run to the rooftop to see the runaway Underdog balloon from the parade.

title: The One with the Monkey
plot: The gang makes and then breaks a pact to celebrate New Year's Eve without dates. Lonely Ross gets a roommate: a monkey named Marcel.

title: The One with Mrs. Bing
plot: When Chandler's romance novelist mother comes to New York to visit him, Joey catches her and Ross kissing.

title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
plot: Monica gives Paolo one of the dozen lasagnas she made for her aunt, who doesn't want them anymore because they've got meat in them.

title: The One with the Boobies
plot: Chandler accidentally sees Rachel wandering around topless after her shower, so Rachel tries to even the score.

title: The One with the Candy Hearts
plot: Joey fixes up Chandler and Janice, and Ross runs into Carol and Susan on a Valentine's Day date.

title: The One with the Stoned Guy
plot: Monica cooks a gourmet meal for a restaurateur looking for a new chef, but unfortunately, he's stoned.

title: The One with the Two Parts: Part 1
plot: Joey falls for Phoebe's twin sister, making Phoebe feel neglected. Ross attends Lamaze classes with Carol and Susan.

title: The One with the Two Parts: Part 2
plot: When Rachel sprains her ankle and has no insurance, she talks Monica into trading identities so she can use Monica's coverage.

title: The One with All the Poker
plot: Rachel interviews for a job as an assistant buyer at Saks Fifth Avenue. The women face the men in a not-so-friendly game of poker.

title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
plot: The gang searches for Marcel, who slipped out of the apartment while Rachel was caring for him.

title: The One with the Evil Orthodontist
plot: Rachel and Barry start dating again, even though he's engaged to Mindy, who wants Rachel to be her maid of honor.

title: The One with the Fake Monica
plot: When Monica's credit card is stolen, she decides to catch the thief.

title: The One with the Ick Factor
plot: After losing his virginity to her, Monica's boyfriend reveals that he's a high school senior. Phoebe temps as Chandler's secretary.

title: The One with the Birth
plot: Carol goes into labor while Ross, Phoebe and Susan get locked in a closet.

title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
plot: During Rachel's birthday party, Chandler accidentally lets it slip that Ross is in love with her.

title: The One with Ross's New Girlfriend
plot: Rachel waits at the airport for Ross, not knowing he is returning from China with his new girlfriend, Julie. Phoebe gives Monica an awful haircut.

title: The One with the Breast Milk
plot: The guys are uncomfortable with the thought of Carol's breast milk, while Rachel is upset by Monica's growing friendship with Julie.

title: The One Where Heckles Dies
plot: After Mr. Heckles dies and leaves all his belongings to Monica and Rachel, Chandler discovers he has eerie similarities with the late eccentric man.

title: The One with Phoebe's Husband
plot: Phoebe has married a gay Canadian ice dancer to help him get his green card.

title: The One with Five Steaks and an Eggplant
plot: Income issues divide the friends. Monica, Ross and Chandler have money; Phoebe, Rachel and Joey don't.

title: The One with the Baby on the Bus
plot: Chandler and Joey lose Ross's son while checking out women on a bus.

title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
plot: A drunken Rachel calls Ross and reveals her feelings for him on his answering machine. Now, Ross must make a decision between her and Julie.

title: The One with the List
plot: Joey and Chandler try to help Ross with his decision to date Julie or Rachel by making a list of the pros and cons of each.

title: The One with Phoebe's Dad
plot: In this Christmas episode, Phoebe tries to track down her real father.

title: The One with Russ
plot: Rachel is dating a guy named Russ, and is blind to his uncanny resemblance to Ross.

title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding
plot: Monica caters the wedding of Ross's ex-wife and her lesbian lover. Rachel learns that her mom and dad are getting a divorce.

title: The One After the Super Bowl: Part 1
plot: Ross travels to San Diego to visit Marcel, his monkey. Joey is stalked by a fan of his daytime drama. First of a two-part episode.

title: The One After the Super Bowl: Part 2
plot: Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme. Ross and Marcel go on a tour of the city. Second of a two-part episode.

title: The One with the Prom Video
plot: Monica and Rachel's prom video reveals Monica's former girth, Rachel's former nose and the way Ross has always felt about Rachel.

title: The One Where Ross and Rachel...You Know
plot: Ross and Rachel finally sleep together. Monica becomes infatuated with one of her parents' friends, for whom she caters a party.

title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
plot: After having a fight with Chandler, Joey moves out. Monica's father finds out that Monica is dating his best friend.

title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
plot: Joey considers moving back in with Chandler, but Chandler has a new roommate.

title: The One Where Dr. Ramoray Dies
plot: Joey's soap opera character gets dropped down an elevator shaft after Joey brags about writing his own lines.

title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go
plot: Chandler demands that his bizarre new roommate, Eddie, move out ... but Eddie won't go.

title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
plot: Phoebe's world view is shattered when she learns how "Old Yeller" really ends.

title: The One with the Bullies
plot: Two bullies eject Chandler and Ross from Central Perk. Phoebe meets a brother she never knew she had.

title: The One with the Two Parties
plot: Complications ensue when Rachel's estranged parents show up at the surprise party that the gang planned for her.

title: The One with the Chicken Pox
plot: Phoebe catches chicken pox from the baby, just as her ex-boyfriend returns on shore leave from the Navy.

title: The One with Barry and Mindy's Wedding
plot: Rachel agrees to be the maid of honor at her ex-fiancé's wedding.

title: The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy
plot: Ross reveals a fantasy to Rachel involving a certain Star Wars character.

title: The One Where No One's Ready
plot: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

title: The One with the Jam
plot: After breaking up with Richard, Monica uses her free time to make jam and consider insemination via a sperm bank.

title: The One with the Metaphorical Tunnel
plot: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll. Phoebe poses as Joey's agent and gets him some good parts.

title: The One with Frank Jr
plot: Phoebe's half-brother visits, and they have trouble bonding.

title: The One with the Flashback
plot: When Janice asks the gang if any of them have ever slept together, the friends flash back to a time three years earlier.

title: The One with the Race Car Bed
plot: Monica buys a new bed from Janice's soon-to-be-ex-husband, but the wrong one is delivered.

title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
plot: Joey and Monica catch Janice kissing her ex-husband.

title: The One with the Football
plot: The gang plays a game of touch football on Thanksgiving.

title: The One Where Rachel Quits
plot: Rachel quits her job after Gunther tells her she needs to be retrained.

title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
plot: A drunken Chandler fools around with one of Joey's sisters -- but he can't remember which one.

title: The One with All the Jealousy
plot: Ross becomes jealous when he thinks he catches Rachel's new co-worker flirting with her.

title: The One Where Monica & Richard Are Just Friends
plot: Monica's willpower is tested when she runs into Richard at a video store.

title: The One with Phoebe's Ex-Partner
plot: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner. Rachel's new job is putting a strain on her relationship with Ross.

title: The One Where Ross & Rachel Take a Break
plot: Ross seeks solace at a party after a bitter fight with Rachel and ends up in the arms of another woman.

title: The One The Morning After
plot: When Rachel discovers that Ross slept with Chloe, she decides to break up with him.

title: The One Without the Ski Trip
plot: A lonely Ross visits Carol when Rachel goes on a ski trip with some friends.

title: The One with the Hypnosis Tape
plot: Phoebe is distraught when her brother wants to marry a woman twice his age.    A hypnosis tape makes Chandler act like a woman.

title: The One with the Tiny T-Shirt
plot: Rachel goes on her first date since her breakup with Ross. Monica dates Pete, even though she is still not attracted to him.

title: The One with the Dollhouse
plot: Joey thinks he's found his true love. Rachel's boss dates Chandler, creating big trouble for Rachel. Monica inherits a dollhouse.

title: The One with a Chick. And a Duck
plot: When Pete buys a restaurant, Monica must decide whether to accept his offer of employment there. Joey and Chandler adopt a duck and a chick.

title: The One with the Screamer
plot: Ross thinks that Rachel's date is crazy. Joey falls in love with Kate, but when she's offered a job in Los Angeles, she takes it.

title: The One with Ross's Thing
plot: Ross finds a strange growth on his buttocks. Phoebe can't choose between two guys. Monica's boyfriend surprises her by not proposing marriage.

title: The One with the Ultimate Fighting Champion
plot: To Monica's horror, Pete plans to be in an ultimate fight. Phoebe sets Ross up on a date with a woman who used to be bald.

title: The One at the Beach
plot: The gang goes to the beach. Phoebe meets a family friend with links to her family's past. Ross discovers that Rachel still loves him.

title: The One with the Jellyfish
plot: Ross dates Rachel again after unwittingly agreeing to take responsibility for their breakup. Monica is stung by a jellyfish.

title: The One with the Cat
plot: Phoebe believes that the cat that jumped into her guitar case in Central Perk contains the spirit of her adoptive mom.

title: The One with the 'Cuffs
plot: Monica tries to prove that she can cater a gourmet meal for her mother. Chandler gets into an embarrassing situation while dating Rachel's boss.

title: The One with the Ballroom Dancing
plot: Joey teaches the building superintendent ballroom dancing to prevent him from evicting Rachel and Monica. Phoebe wants to date a massage client.

title: The One with Joey's New Girlfriend
plot: Joey thinks that Chandler hates Joey's new girlfriend -- but the truth is that Chandler avoids her because he is so attracted to her.

title: The One with the Dirty Girl
plot: Ross's beautiful new girlfriend has a very dirty apartment. Chandler becomes more familiar with Joey's girlfriend.

title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
plot: Chandler is guilt-ridden after kissing Joey's girlfriend. Ross's musical talents are not as amazing as he and Phoebe think.

title: The One with Chandler in a Box
plot: On Thanksgiving, Joey punishes Chandler for kissing Kathy. Monica gets a surprise when she visits an eye doctor: He's her former boyfriend's son.

title: The One Where They're Going to Party
plot: The guys try to be spontaneous and wild. Rachel is offered a promotion. Monica must decide between a job as a head chef or her catering business.

title: The One with the Girl from Poughkeepsie
plot: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship. Chandler tries to get a date for Rachel. Monica plots to establish authority at her new job.

title: The One with Phoebe's Uterus
plot: Phoebe's half-brother makes an astounding announcement: He has married his older girlfriend and wants Phoebe to be a surrogate mother for them.

title: The One with the Embryos
plot: Phoebe undergoes an embryo transplant and becomes pregnant. A simple challenge escalates into a full-blown contest between the guys and the women.

title: The One with Rachel's Crush
plot: Chandler has a hard time with Kathy's new role in a play, in which she pretends to have sex with a handsome man. Rachel is attracted to a customer.

title: The One with Joey's Dirty Day
plot: Joey has no time to shower after he comes home from a three-day fishing trip and has to head out to the set of Charlton Heston's new movie.

title: The One with All the Rugby
plot: Chandler runs into Janice, now divorced, and finds her more irritating than ever. Ross plays rugby to impress Emily.

title: The One with the Fake Party
plot: Rachel throws Emily a phony going-away party so she can see Joshua outside of work. Pregnant Phoebe craves meat.

title: The One with the Free Porn
plot: The guys realize their TV is picking up a porno station for free. Phoebe discovers she's carrying triplets.

title: The One with Rachel's New Dress
plot: Phoebe gets to name one of her babies. Rachel's plans to seduce her boyfriend go awry. Ross worries about his relationship with Emily.

title: The One with All the Haste
plot: Monica and Rachel will do anything to get their old apartment back from the guys. Ross asks Emily to marry him.

title: The One with the Wedding Dresses
plot: Monica wears Emily's wedding dress. Chandler forces Joey to get treatment for his snoring at a sleep clinic. Rachel proposes marriage to Joshua.

title: The One with the Invitation
plot: Rachel and the engaged Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other. The friends get invitations to Ross's wedding.

title: The One with the Worst Best Man Ever
plot: After Joey almost loses Ross's wedding ring, Ross asks both Joey and Chandler to serve as his best man. The girls host a baby shower for Phoebe.

title: The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 1
plot: In London for Ross's wedding, Chandler and Joey argue while sightseeing. After talking with Phoebe, Rachel realizes that she still loves Ross.

title: The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 2
plot: Phoebe tries to warn the friends that Rachel is coming to London. Chandler and Monica develop a connection. Ross's father argues with Emily's father.

title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
plot: Ross and Emily get married, but she cannot forgive him for calling her Rachel during the vows. Chandler and Monica search for a place to have sex.

title: The One with All the Kissing
plot: Chandler kisses both Rachel and Phoebe in order to cover up a kiss he gave to Monica. Rachel finally tells Ross her feelings.

title: The One Hundredth
plot: Phoebe goes into labor and is stuck with a doctor who is obsessed with the show "Happy Days." Monica plans a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
plot: The gang discovers that Phoebe hates PBS. Emily tells Ross she'll give him a second chance only if he cuts all ties with Rachel.

title: The One with the Kips
plot: Chandler and Monica plan a trip to Atlantic City for some private time. When Joey discovers that they are dating, they swear him to secrecy.

title: The One with the Yeti
plot: Monica and Rachel are afraid of a hairy new neighbor -- until they find out how handsome he is with his hair cut.

title: The One Where Ross Moves In
plot: After getting kicked out of his apartment, Ross moves in temporarily with Chandler and Joey, driving all three of them crazy.

title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
plot: It's Thanksgiving, and the gang remembers former terrible Thanksgiving experiences. Chandler tells Monica that he loves her.

title: The One with Ross's Sandwich
plot: Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's dating.

title: The One with the Inappropriate Sister
plot: Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army during the holidays. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

title: The One with All the Resolutions
plot: The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but it looks like Rachel's resolution -- to stop gossiping -- is going to be the hardest to keep.

title: The One with Chandler's Work Laugh
plot: Ross dates Janice after discovering that Emily is getting remarried. Monica hates the fake laugh that Chandler uses in response to his boss's jokes.

title: The One with Joey's Bag
plot: Phoebe meets her father at her grandmother's funeral. Chandler discovers that Monica gives bad massages. Rachel dresses Joey for an audition.

title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
plot: Ross rents an apartment with a window facing Monica and Rachel's place. Phoebe sees Monica and Chandler having sex and learns the truth.

title: The One with the Girl Who Hits Joey
plot: Joey's girlfriend likes to punch him. Ross alienates his new neighbors when he refuses to contribute to the retirement donation for the janitor.

title: The One with the Cop
plot: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

title: The One with Rachel's Inadvertent Kiss
plot: Rachel accidentally kisses the man interviewing her for a job. Joey becomes obsessed with a woman living in Ross' apartment complex.

title: The One Where Rachel Smokes
plot: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

title: The One Where Ross Can't Flirt
plot: Ross tries to flirt with the pizza delivery girl, with horrible results. Rachel loses a pair of earrings that Monica had lent to Phoebe.

title: The One with the Ride-Along
plot: While the men are out, Emily leaves a message for Ross. Rachel, who was in Ross's apartment at the time, hears the message and accidentally erases it.

title: The One with the Ball
plot: Gary asks Phoebe to move in with him. Monica and Chandler join Ross and Joey in a game of catch that lasts for hours.

title: The One with Joey's Big Break
plot: Joey and Chandler take a road trip to Las Vegas, where Joey has landed the lead role in a movie. But the two argue and Joey goes on alone.

title: The One in Vegas: Part 1
plot: The gang decides to go out to Las Vegas to surprise Joey and to celebrate Monica's and Chandler's one-year anniversary.

title: The One in Vegas: Part 2
plot: Monica and Chandler reconcile and, on the roll of the dice, decide to go to a chapel and get married immediately.

title: The One After Vegas
plot: Ross and Rachel wake up together, not realizing they got married the night before. Monica and Chandler talk about moving in together.

title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
plot: Ross has to tell Rachel that they're still married. Chandler is moving in with Monica, and Rachel assumes that she'll be living with them.

title: The One with Ross's Denial
plot: Ross asks Rachel to be his roommate, refusing to admit that he still has feelings for her. Monica and Chandler argue about the apartment.

title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
plot: Joey gets a hernia but doesn't have health insurance to cover getting it treated. Ross puts on a British accent while teaching his new class.

title: The One with Joey's Porsche
plot: Joey pretends that he owns a Porsche. After the incident in Vegas, Ross is feeling like a failure because he's about to get his third divorce.

title: The One on the Last Night
plot: Joey is broke but won't accept help from his friends, so Chandler lets him "win" money in a game. Rachel gets ready to move and fights with Monica.

title: The One Where Phoebe Runs
plot: Phoebe looks goofy when she runs, so Rachel is embarrassed to go jogging with her. Joey is attracted to his new roommate, Janine.

title: The One with Ross's Teeth
plot: Ross whitens his teeth to impress a girl, but he goes way overboard. Phoebe tells Rachel that she hooked up with Ralph Lauren.

title: The One Where Ross Got High
plot: Monica and Ross's parents don't like Chandler because they think he smoked pot in college. Rachel makes a disgusting Thanksgiving dessert.

title: The One with the Routine
plot: Joey, Ross and Monica dance on "Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve." The rest of the gang searches for Monica's hidden Christmas presents.

title: The One with the Apothecary Table
plot: Rachel buys a table from a fancy store and tells Phoebe she got it at the flea market. Janine tells Joey that she doesn't like Monica and Chandler.

title: The One with the Joke
plot: Chandler and Ross both try to take credit for a joke. Monica is insulted when Phoebe says Rachel would make a better girlfriend than her.

title: The One with Rachel's Sister
plot: Rachel's sister, Jill, comes to Rachel for help after her parents cut her off financially. Working as a waiter, Joey hits on the Central Perk customers.

title: The One Where Chandler Can't Cry
plot: When Chandler says he hardly ever cries, everyone tries to make it happen. Rachel's sister, Jill, dates Ross to annoy Rachel.

title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 1
plot: The gang imagines what life would've been like if Rachel had married Barry, Phoebe became a business executive and Monica was still fat.

title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 2
plot: The friends continue to ponder an alternate past in which fat Monica seduces Chandler and married Rachel almost cheats on Barry with Joey.

title: The One with Unagi
plot: When Rachel and Phoebe take a self-defense class, Ross claims he's a martial arts expert. Chandler and Monica forget to buy Valentine's Day gifts.

title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
plot: One of Ross's students asks him on a date. When there's a fire in their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe have to stay with Joey or Monica.

title: The One with Joey's Fridge
plot: Joey tries to convince someone to buy him a new fridge. Ross is worried that his girlfriend will cheat on him during spring break.

title: The One with Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E
plot: Joey's up for the lead in a new TV show, but Chandler forgets to leave him a message that the audition time has changed.

title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeth's Dad
plot: Ross makes a bad impression on Elizabeth's dad, who doesn't approve of them dating. But Elizabeth's dad takes an interest in Rachel.

title: The One Where Paul's the Man
plot: Ross and Elizabeth sneak off to the family cabin, where Rachel and Paul -- who threatened to have Ross fired for dating a student -- are also headed.

title: The One with the Ring
plot: Phoebe is the only one who knows that Chandler is going to propose to Monica, and she lies to Ross to keep him from finding out.

title: The One with the Proposal: Part 1
plot: Chandler's plan to propose to Monica is interrupted when they run into Richard. Joey accidentally buys a boat for $20,000 at a silent auction.

title: The One with the Proposal: Part 2
plot: Richard tells Monica he still loves her. Chandler's attempt to make the proposal a surprise leaves Monica thinking he doesn't want to marry her.

title: The One with the Nap Partners
plot: Rachel and Phoebe compete to be Monica's maid of honor -- but Monica doesn't want to make the decision.

title: The One with Ross' Library Book
plot: Ross discovers that his dissertation is in a section of the library where students go to have sex. Rachel and Phoebe meddle in Joey's relationship.

title: The One Where Chandler Doesn't Like Dogs
plot: Chandler's irrational fear of dogs causes problems when Phoebe brings home a cute canine. Rachel's assistant gives her a Thanksgiving surprise.

title: The One with All the Candy
plot: Monica becomes popular with her neighbors because of her homemade candy. Phoebe decides to learn to ride a bicycle.

title: The One with the Holiday Armadillo
plot: Ross dresses up as the Holiday Armadillo and, with Monica, Chandler and Joey's help, teaches Ben about Chanukah.

title: The One with All the Cheesecakes
plot: Chandler and Rachel can't help eating the irresistible cheesecakes intended for a neighbor. Phoebe's former boyfriend returns for one night only.

title: The One Where They're Up All Night
plot: Monica falls asleep during sex. Rachel argues with Tag. Ross and Joey get stranded on the roof.

title: The One Where Rosita Dies
plot: Phoebe becomes involved with a suicidal office worker. Rachel breaks Joey's favorite chair. Monica's beloved childhood belongings are destroyed.

title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
plot: Rachel's 30th birthday prompts the friends to reminisce about their own 30th birthdays.

title: The One with Joey's New Brain
plot: Joey's character on a daytime drama becomes more prominent -- to the chagrin of the show's diva star.

title: The One with the Truth About London
plot: Chandler finds out who Monica really wanted to have sex with on the night they became lovers. Ross is mad after Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes.

title: The One with the Cheap Wedding Dress
plot: Monica battles another shopper for the perfect wedding dress. Ross and Joey compete for the same woman.

title: The One with Joey's Award
plot: Joey overreacts at a daytime drama awards show. Ross deals with a male student who says he's in love with him.

title: The One with Ross and Monica's Cousin
plot: Monica's gorgeous cousin unwittingly wreaks havoc on Chandler and Ross. Rachel and Phoebe hastily plan a surprise bridal party for Monica.

title: The One with Rachel's Big Kiss
plot: Rachel reveals a titillating secret about her and a former sorority sister. Ross and Chandler compete for wedding tuxedos.

title: The One with the Vows
plot: As Monica and Chandler prepare their wedding vows, everyone reminisces.

title: The One with Chandler's Dad
plot: Chandler confronts his estranged, cross-dressing father. Rachel gets into trouble driving Monica's Porsche.

title: The One with Monica's Thunder
plot: Monica excitedly reveals the good news of her engagement to everyone -- but Rachel and Ross upstage her by reuniting.

title: The One with Rachel's Book
plot: Joey finds out that Rachel is reading a steamy romance novel. Monica discovers that her parents have spent the money for her wedding on a beach house.

title: The One with Phoebe's Cookies
plot: Monica becomes obsessed with acquiring Phoebe's secret, delicious cookie recipe. Joey accepts Rachel's help with sailing.

title: The One with Rachel's Assistant
plot: Rachel wants to hire a cute, young male assistant over a more qualified woman. Joey's show gets cancelled.

title: The One with the Engagement Picture
plot: Joey tries to teach Chandler how to smile for an engagement picture with Monica. Joey takes Tag out for a good time.

title: The One with Chandler and Monica's Wedding: Part 1
plot: As the relatives gather for Monica and Chandler's wedding, Chandler finally realizes the magnitude of what he's doing.

title: The One with Chandler and Monica's Wedding: Part 2
plot: Monica remains blissfully unaware of the potential disasters on her wedding day.

title: The One After I Do
plot: Monica and Chandler's wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that Rachel is pregnant.

title: The One with the Red Sweater
plot: As they prepare to leave the wedding hotel, an excited Monica and Phoebe speculate about who might be the father of pregnant Rachel's baby.

title: The One Where Rachel Tells ...
plot: Everyone seems to know who the father of Rachel's unborn baby is except for the man himself: Ross.

title: The One with the Videotape
plot: Ross and Rachel try to explain how they ended up in bed together six weeks earlier, but the conversation quickly devolves into an argument.

title: The One with Rachel's Date
plot: Ross is horrified to learn that Rachel is going on a date with a handsome actor, especially since she is pregnant with Ross' child.

title: The One with the Halloween Party
plot: At Monica's Halloween party, Phoebe becomes attracted to Eric, the friendly fiancé of her flighty twin, Ursula.

title: The One with the Stain
plot: Ross is happy to learn that pregnant Rachel wants to find her own apartment. Phoebe is ecstatic that Eric has chosen her over her twin sister, Ursula.

title: The One with the Stripper
plot: Rachel nervously tells her short-tempered father that she is pregnant with Ross' baby. Monica feels guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party.

title: The One with the Rumor
plot: Monica invites Will, her high school friend, over for Thanksgiving dinner -- unaware that he isn't too fond of Rachel.

title: The One with Monica's Boots
plot: Chandler becomes upset when Monica spends a fortune on a luxurious pair of black boots. Phoebe tries to meet Sting.

title: The One with the Creepy Holiday Card
plot: Ross becomes nervous when his new girlfriend, Mona, wants to mail cute Christmas cards with both of their pictures on it.

title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
plot: In order to prepare Joey for his big date the following night, Rachel eagerly agrees to accompany him for an evening out.

title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
plot: As Joey agonizes over his secret affection for Rachel, Monica mistakenly thinks that he is infatuated with Phoebe.

title: The One with the Secret Closet
plot: Joey realizes that his feelings for Rachel are excluding Ross from the joys of impending fatherhood. Chandler is obsessed with Monica's locked closet.

title: The One with the Birthing Video
plot: Monica prepares a special Valentine's Day for Chandler, who is too shocked to respond favorably after accidentally viewing the wrong videotape.

title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
plot: Guilt-ridden Joey confesses his love for Rachel to the flabbergasted Ross. Phoebe's new boyfriend shares numerous personality traits with Monica.

title: The One with the Tea Leaves
plot: Feeling awkward after revealing his feelings to Rachel, Joey avoids contact with her. Phoebe believes she will soon meet the man of her dreams.

title: The One in Massapequa
plot: Monica must give a toast at a 35th wedding anniversary party for her parents. Jack and Judy ask Ross and Rachel to pretend to be married at the party.

title: The One with Joey's Interview
plot: Joey is thrilled when his name is used in a Soap Opera Digest crossword puzzle, yet he is reluctant to let the magazine do a profile about him.

title: The One with the Baby Shower
plot: Rachel panics during a party in anticipation of her baby's birth when she realizes how unprepared she is to care for an infant.

title: The One with the Cooking Class
plot: Monica tries to sway a food critic's opinion. Nervous about a major job interview, Chandler receives some questionable coaching from Phoebe.

title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
plot: When Rachel's pregnancy goes beyond her projected delivery date, the pain makes Rachel increasingly irritable.

title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby: Part 1
plot: Rachel waits in the hospital maternity ward with Ross, as numerous other pregnant women are wheeled in while Rachel's painful labor continues.

title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby: Part 2
plot: Rachel gives birth to a beautiful girl, and Ross kisses Rachel. Both hiding their feelings, they wonder how to proceed.

title: The One Where No One Proposes
plot: Because of a misunderstanding, Rachel finds herself engaged to Joey instead of Ross, who was planning to propose.

title: The One Where Emma Cries
plot: Somebody ends up in the hospital when Joey attempts to apologize to Ross for mistakenly asking Rachel to marry him.

title: The One with the Pediatrician
plot: Rachel's constant calls to Emma's pediatrician force him to reject her as a patient.

title: The One with the Sharks
plot: Phoebe fears losing Mike, and her self-doubt is exacerbated by Ross' foolish comments.

title: The One with Phoebe's Birthday Dinner
plot: Rachel is afraid to leave Emma with a babysitter.

title: The One with the Male Nanny
plot: Ross jealously mocks Rachel's choice of an oversensitive male nanny for Emma.

title: The One with Ross' Inappropriate Song
plot: When Chandler's former romantic rival decides to sell his apartment, Chandler persuades Joey to help him inspect it on the sly.

title: The One with Rachel's Other Sister
plot: Rachel's self-centered younger sister, Amy, ruins everyone's Thanksgiving dinner with her uncensored observations.

title: The One with Rachel's Phone Number
plot: While on a night out with Phoebe, Rachel impulsively gives her telephone number to a handsome restaurant patron.

title: The One with Christmas in Tulsa
plot: Because of a critical deadline at work, Chandler is stuck spending Christmas in Tulsa, Okla.

title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
plot: While visiting her workplace to show off baby Emma, Rachel is surprised to find a handsome temp who's been doing her job.

title: The One with Phoebe's Rats
plot: Rachel is irritated to learn that her handsome workplace rival has been invited to her birthday party.

title: The One Where Monica Sings
plot: While Rachel sorts out her conflicted feelings for Gavin, Ross sets out to make her jealous, enlisting Chandler to help him meet attractive women.

title: The One with the Blind Dates
plot: In an attempt to reunite Rachel and Ross, Joey and Phoebe arrange awful blind dates for both of them.

title: The One with the Mugging
plot: Joey develops an unusual acting method to impress a famous fellow actor. Meanwhile, Chandler accepts an internship at an advertising agency.

title: The One with the Boob Job
plot: Phoebe asks Mike to move in with her, but coming so close to married life may cause trouble in their relationship.

title: The One with the Memorial Service
plot: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on his college alumni Web site, Ross retaliates.

title: The One with the Lottery
plot: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets.

title: The One with Rachel's Dream
plot: Nervous because his daytime-drama role requires him to act as if he's deeply in love with a woman, Joey rehearses with Rachel.

title: The One with the Soap Opera Party
plot: Ross is excited when he meets fellow paleontologist Charlie Wheeler, who's a stunning beauty.

title: The One with the Fertility Test
plot: Ross is in agony because Charlie is dating Joey. Meanwhile, Chandler and Monica visit a fertility clinic.

title: The One with the Donor
plot: Disappointed to learn that they can't conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options.

title: The One in Barbados
plot: The gang accompanies Ross to a paleontology convention in Barbados, where Ross bonds with Charlie while Joey and Rachel get drunk together.

title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
plot: Ross has kissed Charlie although she is still officially dating Joey. Joey and Rachel have kissed as well, but they agonize over how to tell Ross.

title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
plot: Rachel, Joey and Charlie attend an uncomfortable dinner party at Ross's apartment. Former surrogate mother Phoebe is visited by her brother, Frank Jr.

title: The One with Ross's Tan
plot: Monica and Phoebe's annoying friend visits, causing a rift between the women. Ross goes to a tanning salon but fails to follow the directions.

title: The One with the Cake
plot: When Ross dashes out to help Rachel for Emma's birthday party, he leaves Joey in charge of keeping everybody in the apartment until they return.

title: The One Where Rachel's Sister Babysits
plot: Rachel thinks her annoying, self-indulgent younger sister, Amy, is finally on the verge of making a major change in her attitude.

title: The One with Ross's Grant
plot: Ross has the chance to receive a grant, but must break up with Charlie to get it. Phoebe tries to give a hideous painting to Monica and Rachel.

title: The One with The Home Study
plot: Phoebe and Mike opt to have a small wedding and donate the extra money to a children's charity -- only to demand it all back later.

title: The One with the Late Thanksgiving
plot: Monica prepares a fabulous Thanksgiving feast for the gang, but she becomes furious when everyone arrives late to the gathering.

title: The One with the Birth Mother
plot: Nervous and excited, Monica and Chandler travel to Ohio to meet a pregnant woman who is considering allowing them to adopt her child when it's born.

title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
plot: When Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a pretty woman during work hours, they follow him.

title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
plot: Joey appears as a celebrity contestant on "The $100,000 Pyramid," but his dubious IQ puts his partner's prize money at risk.

title: The One with Phoebe's Wedding
plot: Phoebe's wedding planner, Monica, is driving everyone around her crazy. Chandler and Ross lobby Rachel to choose one of them as a groomsman.

title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
plot: Monica and Chandler show Erica, the mother of the unborn baby they want to adopt, the sights of New York. Joey implores Phoebe to teach him French.

title: The One with Princess Consuela
plot: Rachel nearly gags on her meal when she goes on a job interview at a restaurant and sits next to her current boss. Phoebe considers changing her name.

title: The One Where Estelle Dies
plot: When Rachel makes a startling announcement, Ross schemes to get her former job back for her. Joey is flustered by the upheaval in his friends' lives.

title: The One with Rachel's Going Away Party
plot: As Rachel prepares to leave for Paris, the gang hosts a farewell party for her. But one friend is offended when he is excluded.

title: The Last One: Part 1 & Part 2
plot: On their last day together, Rachel, Monica, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler and Ross reflect on their shared times with bittersweet emotion.
